GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: Fix some memory leaks in an error handling path of 'log_replay()'

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit bc4a1d384a04c6dba9312e1421a9f9f7c03339a4, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit b46acd6a6a627d876898e1c84d3f84902264b445. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: fs/ntfs3: Fix some memory leaks in an error handling path of 'log_replay()'
OSV.details:
